name: Gravity Assist (B-Ricey763)
description:
Welcome to Gravity Assist! This is a game based on real world physics interactions between planets and satellites. The goal of the game is to slingshot past as many planets as possible.

*Note, when you load the game for the first time, you have to fly around to see the next planet to go to; it is not obvious .  

This game is a prototype of an app that I am developing. It is very rudimentary, but also very, very hard. 

Hope you enjoy!
